articles.title: Average time spent on smartphone up 25% to 6.9 hours amid pandemic: Vivo report - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The study, commissioned by handset maker Vivo and conducted by CMR, said the average time spent on smartphones in a day has been on the rise with average usage growing 11 percent to 5.5 hours in March 2020 (pre-COVID) from about 4.9 hours on average in 2019.
articles.content: Average usage of smartphones by Indians is estimated to have gone up 25 percent to almost 7 hours a day as people depend on these gadgets for work/study from home and entertainment amid the pandemic,… [+3955 chars]
